title: Square-free orders for CM elliptic curves modulo $p$ in short intervals
abstract:
Let $E$ be a CM elliptic curve over $\Bbb{Q}$. We refine the work of Cojocaru
on the asymptotic formulae for the number of primes $p\le x$ for which the
reduction modulo $p$ of $E$ is of square-free order. Also, we derive an
unconditional short interval variant for the asymptotics. Compared to the
estimate derived from the generalised Riemann hypothesis, the presented result
is valid for even shorter intervals. Furthermore, we improve the short interval
variant of the cyclicity problem for CM elliptic curves obtained by the author.
